episode43.name: 45   Alabama Preview
episode43.description: Chuck and Colby visit with Alabama superfan Hayden George. How will the Crimson Tide react to a semifinal loss? Do people still fear the Alabama defense? What is the team's best and worst case scenario?
episode43.keywords: Alabama, WPS, Roll Tide, Arkansas, Razorbacks, Woo Pig, Woo Pig Sooie, Football
